formulas.name: Link_PreApproval
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!paOppIdVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: outstandingDocsMain
formulas.expression: IF({!mainMissingID} = "ID", "ID"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingPayslip} = "Payslip", "Payslip"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingBankS} = "Bank Statement", "Bank Statement"+ BR(), null)

fields.name: errorCoAppMissing
fields.fieldText:
The Main Applicant's martial status has been captured as Married (COP), however there is no Co-applicant/spouse associated with the applicant.


A co-applicant must be added in order to progress with this opportunity.


Please select "Add Co-Applicant" to continue:

fields.name: errorCoAppMissing_0
fields.fieldText:
The Main Applicant's martial status has been captured as Married (COP), however there is no Co-applicant/spouse associated with the applicant.


A co-applicant must be added in order to progress with this opportunity.


Please select "Add Co-Applicant" to continue:

fields.name: errorCoAppMissing_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
The Credit check conducted on the Main Applicant has returned a RED outcome.


A pre-approval opportunity cannot continue while the main applicant has a poor credit status.


Please select Close Opportunity to close this pre-approval opportunity as "Closed Lost - Poor Credit"

fields.name: missingDocsVerification
fields.fieldText: You have not uploaded all of the minimum required documents needed to Mark as Ready for Verification:

fields.name: missingDocsVerification_0
fields.fieldText: You have not uploaded all of the minimum required documents needed to Mark as Ready for Verification:

fields.name: errorRole_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You are not able to work this General Opportunity, an associated Pre-Approval Opportunity is in progress.


{!Link_PreApproval}

fields.name: errorRole_0
fields.fieldText: A Verification is in progress. You are not able to work the opportunity until the verification has been completed:

fields.name: reopenBlock
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_Opportunity.Name} cannot be re-opened due to the stage and status at close off:


Current Stage: {!Get_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_Opportunity.Status__c}


Please create a new General Opportunity for this customer.

fields.name: faultMessage_0_0
fields.fieldText: You do not have the necessary permissions to work this opportunity.

fields.name: faultMessage_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You do not have the necessary permissions to work this opportunity.


Please contact your System Administrator to ensure that your User is linked to the Mortgage Permission set.

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to move {!Get_Opportunity.Name} out of Rehab?


Current Stage: {!Get_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_Opportunity.Status__c}


New Stage: Working

New Status: Awaiting Consent

fields.name: redCredit
fields.fieldText:
Due to the marital agreement and credit check result of the Co Applicant, the Opportunity stage for {!Get_Updated_Opp.Name} has been updated to Closed Lost:


Marital Agreement: Married in Community of Property (COP)

Status: Poor Credit

Credit Check Result: Red

fields.name: runningNotes
fields.fieldText: Verification Outcome Comment: {!Get_Case_Outcome.Verification_Failure_Comment__c}

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to reopen {!Get_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status?


Current Stage: {!Get_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_Opportunity.Status__c}


New Stage: Working

New Status: Awaiting Consent

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to reopen {!Get_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status?


Current Stage: {!Get_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_Opportunity.Status__c}


New Stage: Working

New Status: Awaiting documents

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to reopen {!Get_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status?


Current Stage: {!Get_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_Opportunity.Status__c}


New Stage: Open

New Status: Attempting Contact

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to reopen {!Get_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status?


Current Stage: {!Get_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_Opportunity.Status__c}


New Stage: Nurture

New Status: PA Issued - awaiting OTP

fields.name: chooseApplicantAmend
fields.fieldText: Choose the applicant whose financial information you want to review/amend:

fields.name: oppTeamError
fields.fieldText: An Opportunity Team does not exist for this Opportunity. Please select another Assign to option in order to continue.

fields.name: sendMailTxt
fields.fieldText:
Hi {!Get_Opportunity.Owner.FirstName}!


Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: sendMailTxt_0
fields.fieldText:
Hi {!Get_Opportunity.Owner.FirstName}!


Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.First_Name__c} {!Get_Main_Applicant_Docs.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: minRequiredDocs
fields.fieldText:
Main Applicant

Min Required Documents - ID, Payslip, Bank Statement

fields.name: outcomeRequired
fields.fieldText: The Call Outcome field is required.

fields.name: manualSLAtxt
fields.fieldText: You have the option to set Manual SLA's for this Opportunity until a automated workflow rule is made available by a Stage change or until the Close off Days on the workflow rule is reached.

validationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to set the follow up prior to the current date/time.
You are not allowed to set the follow up prior to the current date/time.

fields.name: callBackDTRequired
fields.fieldText: The Call Back Date Time field is required.

fields.name: wrapUpRequired
fields.fieldText: The Wrap Up Comment field is required.

fields.name: runConsentAgain_0
fields.fieldText: Run Consent, IDV and Credit check for another Applicant or click on Continue:

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessage
textTemplates.text:
<---- Customer Email Sent ---->
Template Selection: {!theTemplate}
Sent To: {!applicantFullName}
Sent From: @[{!$User.Id}]
Sent Date: {!sentTime}
